Package org.daisy.cli

Provides a small framework for command line UI's.

See: Description

    Interface Description
    CommandParserResult  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractUI
    Provides an abstract base for command line UI's.
    Argument
    Provides the information needed by an application argument.
    DefaultCommandParser  
    Definition
    Provides a definition, that is a name and a description
    OptionalArgument
    Provides the information needed by an optional argument.
    ShortFormResolver
    Provides shorter names for factory identifiers, to be used in command line user interfaces.
    SwitchArgument
    Provides a definition for switch arguments.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExitCode
    Provides exit codes to be used by implementing classes.

Package org.daisy.cli Description

Provides a small framework for command line UI's. The intent is to support unnamed/positional arguments and simple key-value arguments that can be passed on directly to e.g. XSLT's.

A switch is treated as shorthand for a specific key-value combination.
